Hello 1.mp3.text: hi there, lets learn how to read english together. If you just play with me 5 minutes per day, you'll read your first words by the end of the week

Hello 1_v2.mp3.text: Hi, lets learn how to read english together! Click the button below to get started

Fable Intro 1.mp3.text: Hi there. Let's learn how to read English together. Press the BIG green button below to start!

Nova Intro 1_v2.mp3.text: Hi there. Let's learn how to read English together. Press the BIG green button below to start!

hi 1.mp3.text: Hi! Click me to get started!

game play 1.mp3.text: Listen to the letter sound. then speak the sound to pop the letter.

A success B start.mp3.text: AMAZING!! You've learned your first letter! Now lets learn the next letter.

game play 1_v2.mp3.text: Listen to the letter sound. then speak the sound to pop the letter. Click the yellow button to start!

Congratulation level 1.mp3.text: AMAZING!! You've learned your first letter! Now we'll show you the letter WITHOUT sound. Say the letter sound as soon as you see it! This will POP the letter. You'll get points for every letter you pop :)

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/intro 1.mp3.text: This is Bamboo Valley. A nature school on a 3.5-rai palm plantation in Phuket. Children spend 4-6 hours outdoors every day. They garden. Care for animals. Play in soil. No screens. No chairs. Just learning the way children are meant to.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/Xmas1.mp3.text: Bamboo Valley Christmas Camp, December 15-26 is an Outdoor nature camp for children 3-12 years old in Phuket, Pasak Soi 8.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/Xmas 2.mp3.text: We offer two programs: Mini Camp for ages 3-6, and Maxi Camp for ages 6-12.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/xmas 3.mp3.text: Gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, and arts & crafts. Beautiful outdoor spaces and naturally designed classrooms. Small groups with licensed and caring English speaking teachers.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/xmas 3_v2.m.text: Our days a filled with wonderful hands on activities like gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, and arts & crafts in beautiful outdoor spaces and naturally designed classrooms. Small groups with licensed and caring English speaking teachers.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/xmas 3_opti.text: Our days are filled with gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, and arts & crafts. Children develop extraordinary curiosity—making them confident, capable learners who adapt and excel naturally—guided by caring English-speaking teachers in small groups.

Gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, arts & crafts. Nurturing head, hands, and hearts—children build curiosity, creativity, and confidence—in small groups with caring English-speaking teachers.

Our days are filled with gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, and arts & crafts. Children develop strong inner motivation and love for learning—guided by caring English-speaking teachers in small groups.
Gardening, animal care, baking, yoga, music, and arts & crafts. Building curious, confident, capable children—in small groups with caring English-speaking teachers.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/4.mp3.text: Ages 6 and up enjoy exciting field trips twice per week—elephant sanctuaries, marine biology, Muay Thai, beach adventures and much more!

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/5.1.mp3.text: Visit phuketcamp.com to learn more and register today.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/5.2.mp3.text:
Register at phuketcamp.com before November 30th for early bird
  pricing.

Bamboo Valley Fly over Video/Full 15 sec.text: Bamboo Valley Phuket offers an outdoor Christmas camp for children 3-12 years old in Passak Soi 8. Our days are filled with animal care, baking, yoga, music and exciting field trips. Register at phuketcamp.com before November 30th for early bird pricing.
